criterion: Provides a clear explanation of the possible causes of dizziness after a head injury
Mentions the importance of monitoring symptoms and seeking medical attention if they worsen
Incorrectly suggests that the dizziness is likely due to a minor neck or muscle strain
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's symptoms and concerns
Response is easy to understand and free of jargon
Incorrectly advises the user to ignore the dizziness and continue playing soccer
Does not provide any specific advice on when it's safe to return to soccer
Provides a balanced view of the potential risks and benefits of returning to soccer
Does not provide any information on the importance of seeking medical attention
Uses a natural and conversational tone
